about_the_game:
"Pathfinder 2 RPG - Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide



Countless Peoples, Countless Techniques!

The boundless continent of Tian Xia features innumerable peoples, each with their own rich history and practices. Bring your character to life with this product adapted from the 136-page guidebook crammed full of everything a player might need to build a hero hailing from or journeying through these vast lands, including:
Six new ancestries, including the reincarnating samsaran, trickster tanuki, and shadowy wayang, as well as Tian-inspired additional feats and heritages for existing ancestries, like the peachchild leshy, bakuwa lizardfolk, and gandharva sprite!
Feats inspired by Tian Xia's diverse arts and practices, from new elemental medicine to alchemically fortified cuisine to how the zodiac can guide your character's path.
Spectacular magical and martial techniques to vanquish the toughest opponents, whether that's through weightless sword arts or by borrowing the ancient power of magical familiars.
Dazzling new magic items and weapons to forge or find, from the subtle kotodama whistle to legendary artifacts like the staff of Sun Wukong.
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • New ancestries and backgrounds in full detail, complete with automation for easy use in game.
  • Scores of new feats, with automation to match, giving even more fun options for characters!
  • More variety of choice for many character classes, from martial to magical.
  • All the beautiful images from the book are available to share with your players as desired.
"
